The square root of 16 is 4: A negative number multiplied by a negative number gives a positive result
The slope of a horizontal line is undefined
The sum of angles in any triangle is 180 degrees
Zero divided by any non-zero number equals zero
The quadratic formula can solve any quadratic equation
A parallelogram always has four right angles
The graph of y = x² is a straight line
The domain of f(x) = 1/x includes zero
A prime number has exactly two factors
The area of a circle with radius 3 is 6π
The inverse of multiplication is subtraction
An isosceles triangle has three equal sides
The greatest common factor of 12 and 18 is 6
